ComicInfo.Summary:
Crime and Punishment: Account of the travesties of medieval penal systems: torture, mutilation, deportation.
Horror's Scrapbook: Weird facts
Skeleton's Gibbet: The gambler Keith Lester commits murder to pay back his debts. Having inherited the family estate, he is dragged before a tribunal of deceased ancestors and hanged for his crime.
Death Reaches Out: A wife killer is haunted by the ghost of his victim and driven into death.
Do You Believe?: Account of superstitions around the globe
The Fifth Corpse: The killer Nick Mangoti suffers from amnesia. After his last hit, he does not remember a thing - until he finds out the hard way.
No Rest for the Dead: Undertaker Lethan Krewal kidnaps his dream girl, kills her and keeps her as his love zombie. Unfortunately he locks himself in with her in a casket.
Monsters of the Deep: A tribe of cruel mermaids capture a human diver and plan on sacrificing him. The mermaid Lissy falls in love with the man, but after a dramatic escape things take a turn for the worse.
ComicInfo.Title: Crime and Punishment; Horror's Scrapbook; Skeleton's Gibbet; Death Reaches Out; Do You Believe?; The Fifth Corpse; No Rest for the Dead; Monsters of the Deep
ComicInfo.Penciller: Rocco Mastroserio,Mike Sekowsky,Gene Fawcette,Ralph Mayo,Rocco Mastroserio,Mike Sekowsky,Gene Fawcette,Ralph Mayo
ComicInfo.Inker: Gene Fawcette,Mike Esposito,Mike Peppe,Ralph Mayo,Gene Fawcette,Mike Esposito,Mike Peppe,Ralph Mayo
